thread.section_title: CarShop Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.carshop.co.uk
thread.title: Jon Sweet

author: Jon Sweet
title: Jon Sweet
text: Bought a newish vehicle from CarShop in Norwich and traded in a much older one. The whole process was very smooth and professional from pre-sales phone call, through showroom visit and test-drive, to finance and then finally handing over the old car and driving away the new one. Particular thanks to Neil Pickford, Martin Denmark and Ryan (in Collections) who made the whole process so friendly and easy.
